about_the_game:
A strategic autobattler where you assemble a powerful army and buy upgrades to enhance it. Balance your resources wisely between miners and units. Refine your tactics to defeat the King and improve your high score!

Assemble your army!


Start building your dream army by picking from Swordsmen, Archers, and Miners. Swordsmen are your tough frontline fighters, Archers take out enemies from afar, and Miners keep the gold flowing for your upgrades. Boost your units with upgrades to make them stronger, faster, and more effective in battle. Finding the right balance between creating a powerful army and maintaining gold production is key to your success.

Defeat your enemies!


Face off against increasingly tough enemies, requiring you to fine-tune your strategy and unit formations. Learn from each encounter and keep improving your strategy.

Earn your Highscore!


The final challenge is taking down the King in just 20 seconds. The more damage you deal, the higher your score, with a 3-star rating as the ultimate goal. Compete against players worldwide on the global leaderboards, aiming to reach the top spot. Show off your skills and become the best in this thrilling strategic autobattler!
